items.sentence: Yesterday I had some free time for the first time in a long time, so I went swimming.
So many people had died that the gravestone supplier was forced to hire a new carver.
When Tom got back to his car, a parking ticket was stuck under the windshield wipers.
We're going to my parents' on Christmas Eve, and my wife's parents' on Christmas Day.
Tom is hoping that he and Mary will be able to spend some time together next weekend.
